data.trans: Gắn bó, tiếp tục cố gắng
data.trans_hint: Bạn sẽ không bao giờ học chơi một nhạc cụ nổi nếu không có ý định cố gắng.
data.en_hint: You'll never learn to play an instrument if you're not going to stick at it.
data.content_game_1: You'll never learn to play an instrument if you're not going to stick at it.
data.answer_en_hint: You'll never learn to play an instrument if you're not going to stick at it.

data.trans: Thắng thứ gì đó một cách dễ dàng
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy thắng được giải thưởng cao nhất một cách dễ dàng.
data.en_hint: He walked off with the top prize.
data.content_game_1: He walked off with the top prize.
data.answer_en_hint: He walked off with the top prize.

data.trans_hint: Bạn có dự định tham gia cuộc đua 100 mét không?
data.en_hint: Are you planning to go in for the 100 metres race?
data.content_game_1: Are you planning to go in for the 100 metres race?
data.answer_en_hint: Are you planning to go in for the 100 metres race?

data.trans: Cực kỳ hăng hái, nhiệt tình
data.trans_hint: Rebecca chụp ảnh cho mọi người vô cùng nhiệt tình khi đi du lịch.
data.en_hint: Rebecca is mad keen on taking photos for people when traveling.
data.content_game_1: Rebecca is mad keen on taking photos for people when traveling.
data.answer_en_hint: Rebecca is mad keen on taking photos for people when traveling.

data.trans_hint: Các bước nhảy này dễ như trở bàn tay với tôi chỉ sau vài ngày tập luyện.
data.en_hint: Those dancing steps have come easily for me just after a few day of practice.
data.content_game_1: Those dancing steps have come easily for me just after a few day of practice.
data.answer_en_hint: Those dancing steps have come easily for me just after a few day of practice.

data.trans_hint: Cậu ấy đang cố gắng học hỏi thêm một số kĩ thuật taekwondo mới thông qua một số video trên youtube.
data.en_hint: He is trying to pick up some more new taekwondo skills via some videos in Youtube.
data.content_game_1: He is trying to pick up some more new taekwondo skills via some videos in Youtube.
data.answer_en_hint: He is trying to pick up some more new taekwondo skills via some videos in Youtube.

data.trans: Khuyến khích ai đó làm gì
data.trans_hint: Bố luôn khuyến khích tôi chơi bóng đá vì đó là môn thể thao yêu thích nhất của ông.
data.en_hint: My father always spurs me on to play football as it is his most favorite kind of sport.
data.content_game_1: My father always spurs me on to play football as it is his most favorite kind of sport.
data.answer_en_hint: My father always spurs me on to play football as it is his most favorite kind of sport.

data.trans: Bắt đầu (1 thói quen hoặc sở thích)
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy đã bắt đầu chơi cờ được vài tuần và đang cực kì mê nó.
data.en_hint: She has taken up playing chess for a few weeks and been really into it.
data.content_game_1: She has taken up playing chess for a few weeks and been really into it.
data.answer_en_hint: She has taken up playing chess for a few weeks and been really into it.

data.trans_hint: Đứa bạn thân thuyết phục tôi đi tập gym nhưng tôi lười quá.
data.en_hint: My best friend talked me into hitting the gym with him but I'm too lazy to do so.
data.content_game_1: My best friend talked me into hitting the gym with him but I'm too lazy to do so.
data.answer_en_hint: My best friend talked me into hitting the gym with him but I'm too lazy to do so.

data.trans: Thuyết phục ai đừng làm gì
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy thuyết phục chị gái bỏ ăn khuya không thành.
data.en_hint: She failed to talk her sister out of eating late at night.
data.content_game_1: She failed to talk her sister out of eating late at night.
data.answer_en_hint: She failed to talk her sister out of eating late at night.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta thử các trò giải đố chỉ để phát hiện ra mình thực sự giải đố rất giỏi.
data.en_hint: He tried puzzle games out just to find out that he is really good at solving puzzles.
data.content_game_1: He tried puzzle games out just to find out that he is really good at solving puzzles.
data.answer_en_hint: He tried puzzle games out just to find out that he is really good at solving puzzles.
